replies.body: Submit a support ticket under "general questions". Upload any screenshot that you may have. People saying you can only report at the post-game lobby are misinformed.

You are incorrect, just today I had the 2nd reply from Riot Support about someone who told me to kill myself in draft lobby and Riot cannot do anything about it. They told me:

"I'm sorry to hear that you had to dodge. There isn't currently an in lobby report system. If you'd really like to see a reporting feature in the pre-game lobby, please share this feedback on the boards. We can't pass feedback reports directly to the development team, but I recommend posting to the Boards because the team is always looking at them to get a feel for things players think could be improved.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous"

So you are allowed to say horrific things to people in draft lobby, because as I'm sure they know (or they wouldn't do it) it is not punishable.

That's iffy, because I've reported somebody once for something said on a lobby that was dodged and what they said was that they would be looking at it. And if the game actually goes through Riot confirmed that what is said on the lobbies (both pre and post game) are all recorded.

You should not post usernames on the forums, you could get shut down for starting a witch-hunt.

Submit a support ticket. I have no idea if this does anything, but you might be able to get someone to manually review that player's account.

Otherwise, yeah all you can do is report them in post-game lobby.
